TextBody:
Hello Ross,
I hope this message finds you well. Regarding your request for a license increase, I'm pleased to introduce Nicoleta Scutaru, our Sales representative, who will assist you with the next steps.

I've included Nicoleta in this email thread (CC'd), and they will reach out shortly to discuss your specific needs and provide any additional information you require.

Thank you for your continued partnership, and please let me know if there's anything else I can assist with!
Best Regards,
Marian Ilies | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.netwrix.com
